Class WorldSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • WorldSimulation

  • public class WorldSimulation
extends java.lang.Object

    WorldSimulation

    This class represents a "world" for boids to live in.
    Since:
    13-04-2015

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorldSimulation(BoidPanel boidPanel, MenuPanel menuPanel)
      Constructor which sets up communication between this and the menu/boid-panel.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createBoid(int x, int y)
      Instantiates a boid with coordinates x and y.
      void createBoids(int nBoids)
      Creates n boids placed randomly within the range of the boidPanels size, adds them to the arrayList.
      void play_pause()
      Starts/stops the timer based on its current state
      void removeBoids(int nBoids)
      Tries to remove the last n boids from the boidList, then repaints
      void reset()
      Resets the world by clearing the array of boids and stopping the timer.
      void setAlignmentBoids(int influenceGrade)
      Sets the influence rate of separation equal to influenceGrade / 100
      void setCohesionBoids(int influenceGrade)
      Sets the influence rate of separation equal to influenceGrade / 100
      void setFPS(int FPS)
      Sets the desired update rate of the timer (and thus the desired FPS of the graphics)
      void setSeparationBoids(int influenceGrade)
      Sets the influence rate of separation equal to influenceGrade / 100
      boolean timerIsRunning()
      Returns a boolean variable where the timer is either running(true) or not running(false)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorldSimulation

        public WorldSimulation(BoidPanel boidPanel,
               MenuPanel menuPanel)
        Constructor which sets up communication between this and the menu/boid-panel. Listeners for resizing and mouse actions are set up. After initiating communication, the timer is set up.
        Parameters:
        boidPanel - A boidPanel to interact with
        menuPanel - A menuPanel to interact with

    • Method Detail

      • createBoids

        public void createBoids(int nBoids)
        Creates n boids placed randomly within the range of the boidPanels size, adds them to the arrayList.
        Parameters:
        nBoids - Number of boids to create

      • createBoid

        public void createBoid(int x,
              int y)
        Instantiates a boid with coordinates x and y. Also sets the influence-sliders values of each boid to the actual slider-value
        Parameters:
        x - Used as x-coordinate
        y - Used as y-coordinate

      • removeBoids

        public void removeBoids(int nBoids)
        Tries to remove the last n boids from the boidList, then repaints
        Parameters:
        nBoids - Number of boids to remove

      • play_pause

        public void play_pause()
        Starts/stops the timer based on its current state

      • timerIsRunning

        public boolean timerIsRunning()
        Returns a boolean variable where the timer is either running(true) or not running(false)
        Returns:
        "Timer is running" - true

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the world by clearing the array of boids and stopping the timer.

      • setFPS

        public void setFPS(int FPS)
        Sets the desired update rate of the timer (and thus the desired FPS of the graphics)
        Parameters:
        FPS - Desired Frames Per Second

      • setSeparationBoids

        public void setSeparationBoids(int influenceGrade)
        Sets the influence rate of separation equal to influenceGrade / 100
        Parameters:
        influenceGrade - Grade of influence

      • setAlignmentBoids

        public void setAlignmentBoids(int influenceGrade)
        Sets the influence rate of separation equal to influenceGrade / 100
        Parameters:
        influenceGrade - Grade of influence

      • setCohesionBoids

        public void setCohesionBoids(int influenceGrade)
        Sets the influence rate of separation equal to influenceGrade / 100
        Parameters:
        influenceGrade - Grade of influence
